title: Honor View 20 hands-on: the future of bezel-less phones
description: The Honor View 20 is one of the first flagship phones to feature a hole-punch display, which is to say it has a selfie camera cutout thats literally just the camera itself. This cutout is almost exactly the size of the opening that a hole punch makes in sheets of paper, so the name seems apt. And it helps to almost completely eliminate the top bezel of the phone. Coming to the View 20 from something like the jumbo-notch-equipped Pixel 3 XL is a delight and a revelation.
